title: Injustice and crying in a dream

preview.html: But we must never forget that crying is a relief from distress and pain, and it is one of the most important means of expressing a person’s psychological state, whether he is going through difficult circumstances or experiencing moments of fun and joy. Interpretation of seeing oppression and crying in a dream for a single, unmarried girl who sees in her dream that she Crying out loud for a dead person is evidence of loss of anxiety and sadness. Seeing oppression and crying over an unknown person is evidence of making things easier. But perhaps it indicates deception of the closest people around him. An unmarried girl who sees that she is crying from injustice cries out loud. This is evidence of her superiority. And her success in her life and she will reach the highest ranks. Seeing a single girl getting married is evidence of the many joys and celebrations that happen in her life. The unmarried woman who saw that she was crying without pain or screaming at the top of her voice, and it was just tears. Evidence of the comfort that she will soon get and get rid of From a lot of stress. The girl who cries loudly and sheds many tears without a sound. This means that she is suffering from distress and sorrow, and God will save her soon. The girl who cries and complains while reading the Qur’an is a good girl and wants to get closer to God. Intense crying accompanied by a loud voice is evidence of A wrong action is done by insight and regretted. The dreamer who cries bitterly and bitterly but keeps her voice silent, is subjected to severe darkness by someone around her. The girl who dreams that she is crying while wearing a brunette. This indicates the death of someone dear to her, and more of her may go away. Worries and problems. A girl crying at a funeral in a dream with an unknown person whom she does not know in reality. This indicates good eyesight and shows that she hears good news. An unmarried woman who sees her crying at her funeral, this is evidence of good news of longevity. Crying means comfort and the removal of distress and worry. By God She will be blessed with a good husband. See also: Crying in a dream is a good omen and why? Interpretation of witnessing injustice and crying in a dream for a married woman. A married woman sees in her dream that she sees an old man and cries. This indicates that she is doing a good deed and more good things in her life. Seeing a married woman crying In her dream, it means that she will be happy. She will be happy in the coming days, her worries will go away, and her desires will be fulfilled. Seeing a married woman crying when she is oppressed is evidence of her victory over her enemy, whether he is a relative or one of her companions. Crying in a dream for a married woman means that she is psychologically stressed and wants to relieve the tension. Or the opposite may happen. For her, if she screams with tears, she will face a problem. A married woman who sees herself crying while she is sick is a sign that she will recover soon. A married woman who cries loudly and with a heavy heart. This means that he will suffer from many problems and misfortunes in life. A married woman crying in a dream while she is listening to... The Qur’an. This is evidence of her humility in her love of God and wants to get closer to Him. A woman who sees that she is crying for her husband while he is alive, this is evidence that she will be exposed to a crisis and great financial difficulties. If the husband dies and the wife cries for him in her dream, this is evidence of her desire for charity.

title: I know Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dark dream

preview.html: Interpretations of dark dreams: Darkness can be considered a source of fear and anxiety for some, and for others peace, tranquility, and distance from the turmoil of the world around them, but in the world of dreams, things are very different from reality. There is no difference between the dark worshiper and the second half. Next article, let us get to know it. Interpretation of a dream of darkness. The dreamer’s vision of darkness in a dream is one of the visions that carry warning connotations for him about the need to wake up from the neglect that occurred at that time and try to improve his behavior before he suffers from dire consequences. If he sees him in the darkness of his sleep, this is a sign that he will suffer from a very bad illness, and the coming period will accompany him for a long time, which will make him very exhausted and he will have to pay more attention to his health condition. That his body can resist the epidemics that surround him. If the dreamer sees in his dream darkness surrounding him from all sides, this means that he will be exposed to many problems in his work in the coming period due to his severe neglect of them, and he must pay attention to performing his duties. . Interpretation Dream of Darkness by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets a person’s dream of darkness in a dream as an indication that there are people around him who are trying to put him in a very malicious conspiracy to harm him severely, and he must be careful in his next steps. Because he can avoid being harmed by them, and if the dreamer sees during his sleep a darkness surrounding him from all sides and he cannot get out of it, this means that he will suffer from a physical illness, which will hurt him a lot and leave him bedridden for a long time. In the event that the dreamer sees in his dream that In a very dark place, this symbolizes that he will be exposed to many crises in his life during the coming period and his inability to get rid of them at all, and his feeling of extreme discomfort. On this subject, and if a man sees in his dream a bright place in the midst of the darkness surrounding him, this means that he will succeed in overcoming many of the obstacles that stood in his way in the previous period and will enable him to achieve his goals afterward with complete ease and ease. The Asrar website for dream interpretation is a website. He specializes in dream interpretation in the Arab world, just write a site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream of darkness for a single woman. An unmarried woman who dreams of darkness in a dream is evidence that she will experience many events that she will experience for the first time in her life and this It makes her feel very nervous and afraid that the results will not be in her favor. Things in the coming period will be very contrary to her plans, and this will confuse her and she will lose her ability to control things around her. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is walking in the dark with her feet, this means that she is very curious and is always looking to discover the mysteries of the things surrounding her.

title: The 100 most important signs to interpret a dream about praying and crying in a dream

preview.html: What did Ibn Sirin say about the dream interpretation of begging and crying in a dream? Interpretation of a dream of praying and crying in a dream It includes hundreds of associations, as the vision contains two of the most powerful symbols that appear in a dream, which are supplication and crying. Praying and crying in a dream The interpretation of begging and crying in a dream indicates Something that the dreamer needs and desires to obtain, and he also hopes that God will protect him and save him from the distress that has been increasing upon him in the past days. The dream indicates the distress that he has experienced in the past few days, and at this moment he feels that he is unable to bear any more sorrows, especially If he cries very sadly, then the general meaning of the scene is comfort after periods of tragedy and sadness. Whoever sees that he was severely slapped while crying and cried when he called on God to save him from his ordeal in life, it is a vision that calls on its owner to be patient with grief, because he may suffer from more problems than him. He is suffering at this time, and in these cases the Lord of the Worlds said in his beloved book (And ask for help in patience and prayer) and if the dreamer pays attention to his prayer and is patient in his heart, he will find joys entering the house after a long wait. The dreamer if his present life is stable and full of blessings and various comforts, but he In his dream, he prayed to God to protect him from the evil of the upcoming events in his life, whether it was illness, the cunning of enemies, or his own occurrence. From anything negative, the dream indicates that he will be protected from any painful event and that he will continue his life without problems. Prayer in a dream is a great message from the Lord of the Worlds to the dreamer, and its content is a lot of supplication in waking life because it changes fate. Whoever is afraid and surrounded by many frightening things will take away his peace of mind. If he sees that he is praying to God with a fervent supplication, he will obtain security and peace. You have a dream that confuses you. Wait.. Google is an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Praying and crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said: If the dreamer cries and tears fall from his eyes without evidence in the dream, it confirms the coming of temptations and distress such as tearing clothes, intense wailing, and slapping the face. If the dream is free of these bad symbols, then it indicates Happiness and happy occasions such as birth, success, promotion, marriage, etc. If the dreamer cries with screams and cries that make people in the dream turn to him and see what he is doing, then he is sad as a result of material or practical losses and may lose the presence of a person in his life, and he feels deep sadness to the point that those around him notice the torment in which he lives. The supplication of the oppressed person in a dream indicates On the return of his right to him and God’s vengeance on the one who insulted him and his sadness over his right that was taken from him. When the dreamer sees in his dream people of his acquaintances or relatives sitting next to him and raising their hands to the Lord of the Worlds to supplicate to Him until the dreamer’s sadness goes away, this is an acceptable supplication. And the dreamer’s life changes from sadness to peace of mind and stability. Praying and crying in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi said: If the dreamer dreams that he is praying to God, and no one sees him in the dream, then he will soon give birth to a boy. And if the dreamer sees in a dream that he is praying to God a lot, then he will perform several types of prayers. Of acts of worship such as prayer and prayer

And if the dreamer sees in a dream that he is praying to God a lot, then he will perform several types of prayers. Of acts of worship such as prayer and prayer

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dowry according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a dowry in a dream for a married woman, for a pregnant woman in exchange for a clip for a man riding a small horse, a small foal, or a small foal for a horse or mare giving birth to a foal, according to Imam al-Sadiq Ibn Sirin and others. The dowry is the young of a horse from the age of one day to the age of one year, if it is a male, and if it is a female it is called A pony. A dream about a pony. Perhaps each of us, when he wakes up from sleep and tells us that he saw a pony in a dream, asks about the true and accurate meaning of this vision, because the vision has different meanings and signs in our lives, and in order to reach the correct information and accurate interpretation, you must say that your vision is correct, Today, through our website, we present to you the best scholars in interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dowry in a dream: Seeing a competent person in a dream means changes for the better that will occur in the life of the dreamer in the near future. A dowry and a dowry in a dream means a son, a girl, a boy, and a slave. Whoever rides a dowry without a saddle and bridle, will marry a boy. New, otherwise it will affect him and make him afraid. Whoever sees a foal in a dream, the dream indicates the kindness and honor that God brings to you. When you see the son of a horse, a foal, or a foal, this indicates that the woman whom the fortuneteller marries is an honest and free woman who has a great relationship. Seeing a foal in A dream indicates beauty, goodness, and good children, God willing. A dream of a dowry indicates sustenance with good children with a handsome face and nice features. Seeing a horse in a dream also indicates the approach of wealth and the abundance of goodness. Seeing a skilled bird is evidence that the person will be blessed with some job or a prestigious position. Whoever sees the dowry Standing at home, the dream indicates that someone will travel from that house. Interpretation of a small horse in a dream. Seeing a small horse in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates an upcoming marriage. If a married woman sees a small horse in a dream, this means that she will acquire great wealth and great power, God willing. Women. A pregnant woman who sees a small horse in a dream indicates that she will live a life full of happiness without problems and troubles. A man who sees a small horse in a dream is a sign of prosperity in work and great success. Interpretation of the foal in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Among the qualities of the filly is its strength, speed, and superior ability to endure and balance, and because the filly symbolizes Horsemanship and leadership. Seeing grass often in a dream is evidence of endurance in difficulties and problems. Interpretation of a dowry in a dream: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is riding on the back of a pony, this is evidence of happiness and pleasure in the coming days, God willing. And if an unmarried girl sees in a dream that there is a dowry He runs quickly and chases her, then this is evidence that this girl has a precious desire that will soon come true. However, if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is entering a race for his pony and this pony wins in that race, then this is evidence of the soon marriage or engagement of someone who fears God and lives with Him. He has it happily and with all pleasure, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of the dowry in a married woman’s dream: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is standing next to a dowry and suddenly there it is.

title: Ibn Sirin's interpretation of the dream of the Prophet Joseph

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing our Master Joseph by Ibn Shirin as a vision of the prophets, may God bless them and grant them peace. In general, it is a good vision that carries with it a wide range of interpretations and connotations. It is considered desirable, which is good news for its viewers. Many people were interested in knowing its meanings, as they differ in their details depending on the condition of the person who sees them and whether the dreamer is a woman or a man. In this article, we present to you the interpretation of a dream about seeing our Prophet Joseph according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams about seeing the Prophet Joseph according to Ibn Shireen. The scholar also considers Ibn Sirin one of The most famous dream interpretation scholars, who specialize in clarifying the interpretations, meanings, and meanings that these visions carry, including the visions of the prophets and messengers of God Almighty, whom they often consider. Signs of good and good, and in this context we know them. The interpretation of our Master Joseph’s dream of seeing Ibn Shirin is also: Seeing God’s Prophet Joseph, peace be upon him, in a dream. It is evidence that the dreamer will get rid of the worries, problems, and sorrows present in the life of the visionary. In the event that the dreamer was a prisoner and saw in a dream our Master Joseph Peace be upon him. This dream is evidence that the dreamer will be released from prison soon, and God is Great and knows this. Seeing the Prophet Joseph, may God bless him and grant him peace, in a dream is not always a good sign. Perhaps it is a sign that the dreamer will fall into injustice, such as the many injustices he suffered himself. , may God’s prayers and peace be upon him, when he was young. Or is it an indication of a false slander against the person who had this vision, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing a mute and deaf person in a dream for a married and single woman. Seeing the Prophet Joseph in a dream about a married woman. To see a married woman in Her dream of our Master Joseph, peace and blessings be upon him, is a sign of the good luck and goodness that the dreamer will receive in her next life. It also carries various other connotations, and in this paragraph we explain to you the interpretation of the vision of the Prophet Joseph in a married woman’s dream. It is also: the vision of the Prophet Joseph, may God bless him and grant him peace. In the dream of a married woman. It is evidence of money and profits that the fortuneteller will receive. Seeing the Prophet Joseph standing in the middle of the house in a dream for a married woman. It is a sign of happy and joyful days that the dreamer will enjoy. If the married woman sees that he, may God bless him and grant him peace, smiled in the The dream. It is evidence of the husband’s intense love for his wife and an indication of the mutual affection between them, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing Jahamah in a dream for single, married, pregnant women and men. Seeing the Prophet Joseph in a dream about a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees this Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, in A dream is a vision that bodes well for her, and its connotations vary based on the details and scenes seen in the dream. In these lines, we explain the interpretation of seeing the Prophet Joseph in a dream with a pregnant woman. It is also: If a pregnant woman sees in a dream the Prophet Joseph, may God bless him and grant him peace, bringing her food. This dream is evidence of Freedom from worry and anxiety, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a pregnant woman sees our Master Joseph, peace be upon him, this is Dr

title: Interpretation of suicide in a dream - seeing suicide in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Suicide of a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, of a single or married man, whether he fell from a building with a knife, a pistol, a suicide attempt, and more by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, and an imam. Al-Sadiq Interpretation of Suicide in a Dream If you dream that you killed yourself, its interpretation is that bad luck will descend upon you with all its weight. If you dream that you hear or see others doing this, know that the failure of others will affect your interests. If a woman sees that her lover commits suicide, it means that she will be disappointed in her lover’s faith in her. Seeing suicide in a dream is a sign of bad luck or that bad things and events will affect the viewer. As for seeing others killing themselves, it is an indication of the impact that will occur as a result of the failure of others. A girl sees that her lover is killing himself, this is an indication that she will feel disappointed in her lover’s devotion to her, and seeing him killing himself in a dream may indicate good news. Interpretation of suicide in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing suicide in a dream as a failure to achieve a specific goal. The dreamer seeks it. Ibn Sirin also said that suicide in a dream may indicate the return of rights to their owners. If one dreams of seeing a poor man committing suicide, this is good news that God will give him a lot of money and enrich him from His bounty. But if one dreams of a rich man committing suicide, this is a sign However, he will lose his money and become poor. If a person sees in a dream that one of his relatives has committed suicide, this is a sign of strengthening the relations between them and their power and the relationship of kinship between them. Seeing common people in a city killing themselves indicates the spread of disease in the city or the occurrence of disasters or misfortunes. Interpretation of suicide In a dream by Ibn Shaheen, seeing someone killing himself in a dream means that this person will suffer a set of problems and misfortunes that will gradually disappear and be resolved, and this may be a sign of this person’s despair of God’s mercy. Suicide in a dream can indicate severe suffering and poverty. If a girl dreams A virgin that she committed suicide and died, then this is a sign that a long time will pass before she gets married. If a girl sees that she is killing herself and does not die, then this is a sign that she will get married soon. If a prisoner sees in his dream that he is killing himself, then this is good news from God, and that God will release his family and Being released from prison, especially if he sees that he has died. Whoever sees that one of his close friends is killing himself, this indicates the betrayal of this friend and that he will disappoint the dreamer. Whoever sees in a dream that someone he knew has died and people are crying around him, but without lamentation and lamentation, this is evidence However, this person does good deeds and God will bless this person’s life and prolong it until he has mercy on her. Enough. Seeing a dead person in a dream and people gathering around him for the purpose of washing and wrapping means that that person is in good health and that his worldly life is safe. Whoever dreams that he is part of a group of hypocrites, and whoever sees in his dream that he is on the bather, then it is good news of exaltation and freedom from worries and sins. He saw that he died and was buried and was not married, he will be married, and if he was a slave, he will be released, and if he was sick and saw that he was married, he will die. Whoever sees in his dream

Interpretation of suicide in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing suicide in a dream as a failure to achieve a specific goal. The dreamer seeks it. Ibn Sirin also said that suicide in a dream may indicate the return of rights to their owners. If one dreams of seeing a poor man committing suicide, this is good news that God will give him a lot of money and enrich him from His bounty. But if one dreams of a rich man committing suicide, this is a sign However, he will lose his money and become poor. If a person sees in a dream that one of his relatives has committed suicide, this is a sign of strengthening the relations between them and their power and the relationship of kinship between them. Seeing common people in a city killing themselves indicates the spread of disease in the city or the occurrence of disasters or misfortunes. Interpretation of suicide In a dream by Ibn Shaheen, seeing someone killing himself in a dream means that this person will suffer a set of problems and misfortunes that will gradually disappear and be resolved, and this may be a sign of this person’s despair of God’s mercy. Suicide in a dream can indicate severe suffering and poverty. If a girl dreams A virgin that she committed suicide and died, then this is a sign that a long time will pass before she gets married. If a girl sees that she is killing herself and does not die, then this is a sign that she will get married soon. If a prisoner sees in his dream that he is killing himself, then this is good news from God, and that God will release his family and Being released from prison, especially if he sees that he has died. Whoever sees that one of his close friends is killing himself, this indicates the betrayal of this friend and that he will disappoint the dreamer. Whoever sees in a dream that someone he knew has died and people are crying around him, but without lamentation and lamentation, this is evidence However, this person does good deeds and God will bless this person’s life and prolong it until he has mercy on her. Enough. Seeing a dead person in a dream and people gathering around him for the purpose of washing and wrapping means that that person is in good health and that his worldly life is safe. Whoever dreams that he is part of a group of hypocrites, and whoever sees in his dream that he is on the bather, then it is good news of exaltation and freedom from worries and sins. He saw that he died and was buried and was not married, he will be married, and if he was a slave, he will be released, and if he was sick and saw that he was married, he will die.
